passive.name: Chaos Elixir
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases DoT dealt by the wearer by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s). When a target enemy suffering from DoT imposed by the wearer is defeated, regenerates <orangeStrong>{{4}}</orangeStrong> Energy for the wearer.
